root: ^it's supposed to be top-secret in the village, but...
^did you know that murders have occurred in this very forest?
^the victims were all humans, or so the rumour goes.
^why am i spilling the beans about the village's secrets?
^well, why not! i don't belong to this village anymore.
^none of us bats have a place here, after we were chased out by that EVIL bird everyone idolises.
^we will always be the villains of the story...just because you got recruited by that UGLY bird first.
^it's sad how you got roped into killing my brethren who're here to take revenge on the village.
^well, whateva! have fun playing lapdog for the EVIL bird.
^maybe one day you'll cause the village to come crashing down, as it truly should!
